centerName: CHRIST EVANGELICAL LUTHERAN CHURCH OF WOODSIDE LONG ISLAND NEW YORK
permitHolder: CHRIST EVANGELICAL LUTHERAN CHURCH OF WOODSIDE LONG ISLAND NEW YORK

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required Fines pending

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that individual associated with child care service/camp involved in an act detrimental to health and safety
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service/camp obstructed DOHMH staff from conducting duties of the Department at the time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide constant and competent supervision for children within its care
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to notify DOHMH within 24 hours of child abuse allegation/indication or record of criminal activity of individuals associated with child care service serious injury death or loss of a child
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service unable to document that all children enrolled have had an age appropriate medical evaluation
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
